name: ReRoll (itch) (galactum)
description:
ReRoll

Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2022

You are a die fighting other dice.

This is my first game, so don't expect much.

HOW TO PLAY:

A/D to move left or right
Space to jump
Click to shoot

Bullets subtract from the enemy's current value (changes on reroll). When the current value hits 0 the enemy despawns and its maximum value gets added to your score.

You can also kill an enemy by touching it if your value is higher than its value. However, if the opposite is true, you will fail.

On death, enemies drop dice. Dice can be used to reroll a random value (by pressing V). Dice have a 1/4 chance of being Super Dice, which allow you to choose what value is rerolled. Press C to use.

Enemies' maximum value gets higher the farther out you go from spawn.
